channel.title: MySQL on asktao
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on asktao

item.title: MySQL 查询表字段
item.description: 查询数据库中某个字段的使用情况，可以借助 MySQL 的 information_schema 例：查询 user_name 的字段 SELECT * FROM `information_schema`.`columns` WHERE `column_name` = 'user_name'; 亦支持 like SELECT * FROM `information_schema`.`columns` WHERE `column_name` LIKE '%user_name%';
